augmented_text_with_vlm:
[PRODUCT] Firefox
[COMPONENT] Bookmarks & History
[VERSION] 141
[OS] Windows 11
[SUMMARY] Fullscreen (F11) never shows the bookmarks toolbar
[DESCRIPTION] When entering fullscreen mode using F11, the bookmarks toolbar is not visible even after moving the mouse to the top of the screen. The toolbar should appear when hovering over the top edge.
[STEPS] 1. Open Firefox
2. Press F11 to enter fullscreen
3. Move mouse to top of screen
[OBSERVED] Bookmarks toolbar does not appear
[EXPECTED] Bookmarks toolbar should appear when hovering over top edge
[SCREENSHOT_CAPTION] The browser window shows a webpage in fullscreen mode. The top of the screen is visible but the bookmarks toolbar is not shown. The mouse cursor is positioned at the top edge of the screen.
[SCREENSHOT_ERROR_TEXT] No error messages visible in the screenshot.

[PRODUCT] Firefox
[COMPONENT] General
[VERSION] 141
[OS] Linux
[SUMMARY] Browser crashes on startup
[DESCRIPTION] Firefox crashes immediately after launching. No error dialog is shown.
[ERROR] Crash signature: mozilla::dom::ContentChild::RecvPrint
[SCREENSHOT_CAPTION] Terminal window showing error messages. The text indicates a segmentation fault occurred during Firefox startup.
[SCREENSHOT_ERROR_TEXT] Segmentation fault (core dumped)
mozilla::dom::ContentChild::RecvPrint
